name: Nufloors Flooring
tag_list: hardwood-flooring, laminate-flooring, carpet, cork-flooring, bamboo-flooring, tiles, natural-stone, granite-countertops, granite-tiles, glass-tiles, resilient-flooring, ceramic-tiles, area-rugs, window-blinds
overview:
Nufloors Group owners and their assistants are always reviewing new product information to deliver to you at the terrific value and service. If you are thinking about a gorgeous hardwood flooring, ceramic tiles or even just carpet to add some dazzling sparkle, then visit us today.

We have quality flooring with the up to date styles & unparalleled designs by top brands such as Shaw to suitably fit your own lifestyle and budget.

Nufloors has been in business for over 2 decades and is the leading in floor covering. We have 25 locations across Canada. We commit to work with you to help make the most well informed decision on your new floors and install products you’ll be proud of for years.
